artist: Jack Larsen Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Kelly green, med. green & metallic blue warp.  Med. green, blue, olive weft.  Machine edged on both sides. Stapled to 8.5 x 11" card along with 99.1.1213.3. "U7C" written on tag stapled to sample. "H-8B" and  "#1 Lapis" written on card. (greens, metallic blue)
title: Lapis Development Sample
